sentences.sContent: This is huge for a pterosaur.
sentences.sCn: 这对翼龙来说非常巨大。

sentences.sContent: OK, so we’ve got a very large alligator with the wings of a pterosaur that can repel musket fire.
sentences.sContent_eng: OK, so we’ve got a very large alligator with the wings of a pterosaur that can repel musket fire.
sentences.sCn: 好了，那么我们有了个拥有翼龙翅膀的超大鳄鱼，还能抵挡住火枪的火力。

sentences.sContent: "The most important thing about this particular individual is that she has a relatively large pelvis compared to other individuals of the same pterosaur, Darwinopterus," explained Dr Unwin.
sentences.sContent_eng: "The most important thing about this particular individual is that she has a relatively large pelvis compared to other individuals of the same pterosaur, Darwinopterus," explained Dr Unwin.
sentences.sCn: 这一达尔文翼龙个体跟其他个体最重要的区别是她有很大的盆骨。 Unwin博士指出。

trans.tranOther: any extinct flying reptile of the order Pterosauria, of Jurassic and Cretaceous times: included the pterodactyls
